tgt_original: dehi me samayaṃ tattvaṃ bodhicittaṃ ca dehi me |
buddhaṃ dharmaṃ ca saṃghaṃ ca dehi me śaraṇatrayam ||190 ||
triruccāryaitān śiṣyāñjñātvā yadbhaktivatsalān ||191 ||  prathānaṃ śiṣyamekaṃ tu kṛtvā brūyādidaṃ vacaḥ |
mantraprayogamatulaṃ yena bhagnaṃ mahābalam |  mārasainyaṃ mahāghoraṃ śākyasiṃhādibhirvaraiḥ ||194 ||
